characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching a traffic light intersection. A white sedan is parked on the left side of the road. A truck suddenly appears from the left side and cuts into the lane, causing dust and debris to fly. The trucks abrupt movement poses a significant danger to the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the intersection. The sudden appearance of the truck from the left side forces the vehicle to decelerate rapidly to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, parked and stationary. 2) Left side: A truck, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly cuts into the lane, causing dust and debris to fly.
